mapper.insert: INSERT INTO borrow_record (user_id, book_id, borrow_date, due_date, status, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{bookId}, #{borrowDate}, #{dueDate}, #{status}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE borrow_record SET return_date = #{returnDate}, status = #{status}, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT br.*, u.username, b.name as book_name FROM borrow_record br LEFT JOIN user u ON br.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN book b ON br.book_id = b.id WHERE br.id = #{id}
